name: Clones (itch) (Keegan Lenz)
description:
This game was made during a 72 hour Love2d game jam.

Objective: Avoid the clones for as long as you can. Shoot and destroy clones to gain points.

Note: This game does not have a way to exit. If you wish to exit the game,  press ALT + F4 if you are on windows or Command + W if you are on a macOS system.

Controls:
- WASD to move
- Mouse to aim
- Space to shoot

Music Credits:
- Music: Retro LSD
- Artist : DZGRIMX
